name: WP Search Keyword Highlight
author: Suifengtec

sections.description:
Installs ‘WP Search Keyword Highlight’ on your wordpress blog so it will highlight the search keyword(s) on the search result page(s),you can specify the background color and the text color for the search keyword(s).

Enjoy it!
sections.installation:
• Use WordPress’ builtin plugin installation system located in your WordPress admin panel, labeled as the “Add New” options in the “Plugins” menu to upload the zip file you downloaded
  • Extract the zip file and upload the resulting “ink” folder on your server under wp-content/plugins/.

All you need to do after that is navigate to your blog’s administration panel, go in the plugins section and enable No Open Sans font from Google fonts.

For more information, see the “Installing Plugins” article on the WordPress Codex.
sections.faq:
Throw a message on:SUPPORT PAGE

Any technical requirements?

Throw a message on:<SUPPORT PAGE

short_description: This plugin will highlight the search keyword(s) each time,you can specify a background color and a text color for the search keyword(s).
description:
Installs ‘WP Search Keyword Highlight’ on your wordpress blog so it will highlight the search keyword(s) on the search result page(s),you can specify the background color and the text color for the search keyword(s).

screenshots.caption: If you install and activate this plugin,you will find a new menu item 'SKH Pannel' in your Wordpress admin tab 'Setting'.
By clicking on the menu item,open the options page.
